name: The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites, Los Angeles
address: 404 South Figueroa Street, Los Angeles, CA 90071
description: Set in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, The Westin Bonaventure Hotel & Suites, Los Angeles radiates an elegance that has attracted U.S. Presidents, dignitaries, and beloved stars of TV and film. The hotel welcomes travelers visiting Southern California with a soaring atrium, world class amenities, and an unforgettable experience. Stay on top of your fitness in our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio and go for a swim in the newly renovated outdoor pool. Indulge in inspiring cuisine at our hotel restaurants including Lakeview Bistro and our award-winning LA Prime steakhouse. Recharge in our well-appointed, pet-friendly rooms and suites. Every room features our Heavenly® Beds, mini-refrigerators, HDTVs, large work desks, free Wi-Fi, and floor-to-ceiling windows with impressive city views. Suites offer separate living rooms, dining/meeting tables, wet bars, and marble bathrooms. With 166,553 sq. ft. of elevated indoor and outdoor venues, event planners can organize anything from lavish weddings to board meetings.Marriott

name: W Los Angeles - West Beverly Hills
address: 930 Hilgard Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90024
description: W Los Angeles – West Beverly Hills welcomes hotel guests to its urban retreat with personalized service, high-energy interiors and luxury amenities. Stay in the heart of Westwood, LA, steps from UCLA and the Medical Center and minutes from designer boutiques on Rodeo Drive, Santa Monica beaches and West LA museums. Our pet-friendly hotel include suites with cutting-edge technology, flatscreen TVs, mini-bars, mini-refrigerators and indulgent bedding. Business travelers will appreciate large desks and Wi-Fi access. Indulge in steaks as the DJ spins at STK Los Angeles, sample California cuisine by the pool or sip handcrafted cocktails at our Living Room Bar. Relax in our poolside cabanas, take a dip in the WET® outdoor pool or work out in the FIT® gym. Event planners will be wowed by spectacular indoor and outdoor venues, expertly supported by custom catering and state-of-the-art technology. Westwood, Beverly Hills and all of LA await when you book your hotel room at W Los Angeles – West Beverly Hills.Marriott

name: Fairmont Century Plaza
address: 2025 Avenue Of The Stars, Los Angeles, CA 90067
description: Los Angeles' famed Century Plaza hotel has returned to center stage following a $2.5B renovation. The property has been completely reimagined with 400 expansive guest rooms featuring private terraces, 63 luxury residences, the 14,000 square-foot Fairmont Spa Century Plaza, Lumière - a French-inspired Brasserie, and 24,000 square-feet of private event space. Born on the former site of a 20th Century Studios backlot in 1966, the Century Plaza has always been at the center of where business meets Hollywood.accorhotels.com

name: Renaissance Los Angeles Airport Hotel
address: 9620 Airport Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: Experience the charm and tranquility of our newly redesigned boutique-style hotel by LAX Airport, providing a relaxing retreat for your stay. Our airport hotel in Los Angeles, with free shuttles and long-term parking, is near Manhattan Beach, SoFi Stadium, The Forum and much more. Relax in urban chic accommodations with plush bedding and deluxe amenities offering views of LAX. All our hotel rooms are dog friendly. Unwind in our trendy lobby or lounge with a signature cocktail and live tunes from local musicians with Evenings at Renaissance. Dig into authentic California cuisine at ICON, An LA Eatery, craft beers at Studio 12 Bar and Lounge, and our new illy Cafe for your morning coffee. Dip your toes in our outdoor pool or workout in our modern fitness center. Meetings, weddings and special celebrations are more than ordinary in our renovated event venues. We look forward to welcoming you into our cosmopolitan oasis, Renaissance Los Angeles Airport Hotel.Marriott

name: Hotel Indigo Los Angeles Downtown
address: 899 Francisco Street, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: At Hotel Indigo® Los Angeles Downtown, you’ll experience the city’s thriving creativity, urban vibe and unique multiculturalism both inside and out. With convenient access to a variety of entertainment, dining and shopping options, including the iconic L.A. Live complex, Crypto.com Arena and The Arts & Jewelry District. Throughout the hotel, you’ll find décor with floral accents that recall La Fiesta de las Flores, an event that has showcased the city’s international melting pot since 1894. With neon lights that mirror world-famous L.A. nightlife, 18 Social features sweeping views of the dazzling lights that illuminate Los Angeles every night. In your room, cityscapes fill the walls, while our spa-style bathrooms were inspired by pre-Hollywood glamour and the jewelry that accessorized Golden Age cinema. No other hotel in Los Angeles provides such an immersive experience. Come and create YOUR LA Story.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: SLS Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Beverly Hills
address: 465 South La Cienega Boulevard, Beverly Hills, CA 90048
description: SLS Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Beverly Hills welcomes you with superb service, chic hotel accommodations and inspired amenities. Set the stage for your Los Angeles adventure with a sleek, modern design by Philippe Starck and a rooftop pool deck with stunning city views. Enjoy luxury creature comforts in our pet-friendly rooms and suites with custom-made furnishings and five-star amenities. Seven upscale suite categories offer a variety of layouts including some with outdoor terraces and balconies with city and garden views. Savor lingering sunsets over Beverly Hills while enjoying elevated dining at Vista Rooftop. Pamper yourself at the celestial Ciel Spa at SLS after taking a dip in the rooftop pool or working out in the 24/7 gym. Our indoor and outdoor venues can accommodate everything from grand outdoor weddings to private business dinners. Our five-star hotel is near Rodeo Drive, West Hollywood, the Hollywood Walk of Fame and many other notable Los Angeles and Beverly Hills attractions.Marriott

name: Kimpton Everly Hotel
address: 1800 Argyle Avenue, Los Angeles, CA 90028
description: Kimpton Everly Hotel offers a breath of fresh air among the swirl of hotels in Hollywood. Escape into highly interactive social spaces ranging from the light-filled Jane Q café and buzz-worthy Ever Bar, to a skyline heated pool with private cabana rentals and an outdoor lounge serving cocktails and light bites. When it’s time to retire, you’ll love the happy hues and mellow atmosphere of our guest rooms and suites, the thoughtful amenities that invite comfort and ease, and the fabulous views of the shimmering downtown skyline or the Hollywood Hills.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hilton Los Angeles Airport
address: 5711 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: The Hilton Los Angeles Airport hotel offers the uncompromising accommodations and services of a luxury hotel. Our property is located just a quarter mile from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) in sunny Los Angeles, California. Complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport is available 24-hours a day. The Hilton Los Angeles Airport hotel features comfortable elegance that appeals to all types of travelers. The leisure traveler will appreciate: Complimentary shuttle service to and from LAX Airport every 15 minutes, LAX Airport Parking in a covered and secured garage, Shuttle service available to Manhattan Beach, A variety of dining options - The Cafe, The Bistro, Andiamo, Landings Bar and 24-Hour In Room Dining, 1,234 redesigned guestrooms, Wireless Internet access in public areas, Complimentary 24-hour Fitness Center, Outdoor pool and whirlpool, Hertz rental car in the Lobby, Complimentary safety deposit boxes, Same day laundry and dry cleaning. EV Charging Stations are available in both Valet and Self-Parking. If you are traveling on business or planning a meeting, wedding or social event, look no further. Our hotel offers all of the amenities you will need to make your event a success. 25,000 square feet of beautifully renovated meeting space - Including 30 function rooms, 2 boardrooms and La Jolla Ballroom, Meeting incentives you won't want to miss, DS-3 Internet connection giving you a seamless connection at the highest speed available, Fully equipped, 24-hour Business Center, Outdoor space ideal for coffee breaks, receptions and banquets for up to 300 people, On-site Audio and Visual Team, Hospitality desk for immediate assistance with all of your meeting needs, Individual meeting space temperature controls. Of course we realize, nobody wants to be stuck in their hotel room the entire time they are in sunny California so get out and see the sites. We are centrally located to a variety of attractions and destinations but here are just a few to get you started: Grab a towel and head to one of our beautiful beaches - Marina Del Rey, Venice or Santa Monica, What is a trip to Southern California without stopping by to see Donald Duck, Mickey Mouse, Goofy and the gang at Disneyland Park, Get star struck at Universal Studios Hollywood, Hollywood Park where you can visit six different casinos covering three states, See over 300 paintings, 700 sculptures and decorative objects and an ever changing number of photos, drawings and manuscripts at the J. Paul Getty Museum. As one of the world's largest airport hotels, the Hilton Los Angeles Airport's impeccable service belies its size. We host a multilingual staff that will make you feel at home. Our attention to detail, quick responsiveness and "At Your Service" culture will be felt the moment you arrive. Touch down at our luxury destination hotel - It happens at the Hilton Los Angeles Airport hotel. Travel should take you places.Hilton

name: Residence Inn Los Angeles Torrance/Redondo Beach
address: 3701 Torrance Boulevard, Torrance, CA 90503
description: Experience a refreshing stay at Residence Inn Los Angeles Torrance/Redondo Beach. Conveniently located near the Palos Verdes Peninsula and 9.9 miles from Los Angeles International Airport, our extended-stay hotel in Torrance, California, offers access to more than 30 miles of hiking trails at Palos Verdes Nature Preserve with views of the Pacific. Visit Disneyland® and Del Amo Fashion Center®, as well as the shorelines of Redondo Beach Pier, Torrance Beach, Hermosa Beach and Manhattan Beach. Relax in our spacious suites featuring fully equipped kitchens, complimentary Wi-Fi and ergonomic workstations. Wake up refreshed and enjoy our complimentary breakfast buffet before heading out. Maintain your exercise routine using our 24-hour fitness center, and swim in our sparkling outdoor pool. If you are traveling with a group for business or leisure, take advantage of our special rates for room blocks. You'll feel at home in California while staying at Residence Inn Los Angeles Torrance/Redondo Beach.Marriott

name: The Delphi Hotel
address: 550 South Flower Street, Los Angeles, CA 90071
description: Located in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, this iconic and renowned hotel is 4 blocks from the Walt Disney Concert Hall and 5 blocks from the BROAD Museum. The Delphi Hotel offers modern rooms with a glass walk-in shower, mini-bar, and free Wi-Fi. The Delphi Hotel Lounge is open from 7am daily and features unforgetable coffees, teas, and cocktails to tantalize even the most discerning palate. Guests of Downtown The Delphi Hotel can enjoy an outdoor lounge, and gather with others around our secluded outdoor fire pit. Denae's Diner, opening in July 2023, will feature familiar comfort food, elevated in both flavor and presentation, for an unparalleled all-day dining experience. Los Angeles Museum of Contemporary Art is less than 1 mi from The Delphi Hotel and Dodger Stadium is 3.8 mi away. The hotel is 18 mi from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX).

name: Residence Inn By Marriott Los Angeles Lax/Century Boulevard
address: 5933 West Century Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90045
description: The Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles LAX/Century Blvd boasts the largest guest suites near Los Angeles International Airport. All Suites are well-appointed with a sofa bed, plus a complete kitchen with microwave, full-size fridge, stovetop, dishwasher, and all related cookware. Standard complimentary amenities include a hot breakfast each morning, Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel, 24-hour shuttle to/from LAX airport running every 25-35 minutes (available on the upper level of LAX), outdoor heated pool, and fitness center. We have three onsite restaurants: Starbucks, Jersey Mike's, and ZPizza and Tap Room. Attend concerts and professional sporting events at venues such as SoFi Stadium and The Forum as well as downtown's Staples Center and Microsoft Theatre. Inquire about shuttle service to concerts and football games. If business brings you to L.A; our Residence Inn is convenient to El Segundo, Manhattan Beach, Marina del Rey, and the greater Hollywood Area and Entertainment Capital of the World!Marriott

name: Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City
address: 555 Universal Hollywood Drive, Universal City, CA 91608-1001
description: Daily Mandatory Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: LA Hotel Worker Protection Ordinance Fee, LA Tourism Marketing District Assessment, and California Tourism Assessment. FOUR-DIAMOND SERVICE IN THE HEART OF THE ENTERTAINMENT DISTRICT The Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel is a 24-story glistening hotel high on the hilltop located at the main entrance to Universal Studios Hollywood and Universal CityWalk. Our hotel conveys the style and feel of contemporary California living in a relaxed resort setting and adds a host of modern comforts and conveniences. The hotel's ongoing commitment to superior service and exceptional standards of excellence earned us the coveted AAA Four Diamond Award, Smart Meetings Platinum Choice Award and Successful Meetings Pinnacle Award. At the Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel, guests can relax in a spacious guestroom with magnificent panoramic views of the Hollywood hills and all the major studios including Universal Studios, Disney Studios, Warner Brothers Studios and NBC Studios to name a few. With stylish furnishings and your comfort in mind, each room is designed with thoughtful business amenities such as high-speed Internet access, two-line phones, safes, and mini-bars. Savor an eclectic blend of culinary delights including California, Continental and Chinese cuisines at our award-winning Cafe Sierra, voted California's Number One Seafood & Prime Rib Buffet. Unwind with a book in our Lobby Lounge while enjoying your favorite cordial or revitalize in our state-of-the-art fitness facility featuring Precor equipment. At the Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel, our team is committed to make your stay a memorable one. Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City Hotel Nearby Points of Interest Universal Studios, CityWalk & Gibson Amphitheater - Adjacent, Red Line Train - 0.1 miles, NBC - 0.5 miles, Hollywood and Highland, Dolby Theater - 3 miles, Hollywood Bowl - 2 Miles, CBS Studios - 3 miles, ABC Broadcasting/Disney Studios - 3 miles, NBC Studios - 3 miles, St. Joseph Hospital - 3 miles, Warner Brothers Studios - 3 miles, Walk of Fame - 3 miles, CNN/Turner Broadcasting - 4 miles, Forest Lawn - 4 miles, Equestrian Center - 4 miles, Grauman's Chinese Theater - 3 miles, Gene Autry Western Museum - 5 Miles, Capitol Records - 5 miles, Los Angeles Zoo - 6 miles, Paramount Studios - 5 miles, Melrose Ave - 6 Miles, Nestle Corporation - 8 miles, Dreamworks SKG - 7 miles, Griffith Park Observatory - 7 miles, Staples Center - 10 miles, Los Angeles Convention Center - 11 miles, LA Live & Nokia Theater - 11 miles, Disney Center for the Performing Arts - 10 miles, Rodeo Drive - 15 miles, California Beaches - 21 miles, Queen Mary Long Beach - 35 miles, Six Flags Magic Mountain - 26 miles, Knott's Berry Farm - 31 miles, Disneyland - 36 miles. Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City Hotel Location The Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City hotel is located in the heart of the ''Entertainment District'' of Los Angeles, California at the main entrance to Universal Studios Hollywood, Universal CityWalk and Gibson Amphitheater, two minutes to most of the major Hollywood Studios, five minutes to Hollywood and Highland, Dolby Theater, Hollywood Bowl and Burbank Airport, 10 minutes to Glendale, 15 minutes to Pasadena and Rose Bowl, 20 minutes to Downtown Los Angeles, Los Angeles Convention Center, Staples Center and the new Nokia Theater and LA Live, and 45 minutes to Los Angeles International Airport. Other nearby attractions and hot spots include Griffith Park Observatory, Greek Theater, Autry Western Heritage Museum, Magic Mountain, Disneyland, Knott's Berry Farm, Rodeo Drive, Beverly Hills, and the Southern California beaches. Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City Hotel Rooms and Amenities Our spacious guest rooms and nine suites, each with expansive offering panoramic views, make the Hilton Los Angeles/Universal City stand above other area hotels. Features include such welcome amenities as high-speed IntHilton

name: Le Méridien Delfina Santa Monica
address: 530 Pico Boulevard, Santa Monica, CA 90405
description: Stimulate your passion for discovery at Le Méridien Santa Monica Hotel, a boutique hotel ideally situated near the beach in Santa Monica, CA. Boasting an elevated perch, our luxury hotel overlooks the Pacific Ocean and Santa Monica Mountains from a truly exclusive vantage point. Close to Venice and short walk from the Santa Monica Pier, our hotel invites you to connect, disconnect or simply savor the moment. Your arrival is met with thoughtful hints of hospitality, including two glasses of champagne. Or perhaps a free beach bike is more your speed? A state-of-the-art 24/7 fitness center with Peloton bikes quickens the pulse, while a nap by our heated outdoor pool relaxes and restores the spirit. Stir your evening to life with a drink at Longitude Bar + Restaurant or unwind all night over craft cocktails and California-inspired cuisine in our dining room. Pet-friendly hotel rooms keep you in a laid-back Santa Monica state of mind with their contemporary décor, luxury bedding and interesting pops of color.Marriott

name: Hotel Bel-Air - Dorchester Collection
address: 701 Stone Canyon Road, Los Angeles, CA 90077
description: No description found

name: Andaz West Hollywood-a concept by Hyatt
address: 8401 West Sunset Boulevard, West Hollywood, CA 90069
description: Just 5 minutes’ walk from the Sunset Strip, the Andaz West Hollywood - a Concept by Hyatt features onsite dining and a rooftop pool. Rooms feature complimentary nonalcoholic beverages and snacks and free WiFi. A flat-screen TV and an electronics docking station are provided in each room at the Andaz West Hollywood - a Concept by Hyatt. Free toiletries and bathrobes are also provided in the modern rooms. RH, the West Hollywood Andaz’s onsite restaurant. features seasonal California cuisine. The restaurant works to highlight “market to table” dishes. RH Bar is a chic evening space serving signature cocktails and appetizers. Guests can enjoy The Sundeck for poolside dining with fresh, light options. A business center and fitness center are available for guest use. The Beverly Plaza is 2 mi away from the hotel. Hollywood is 3.1 mi from the property.

name: Hyatt Place Lax El Segundo
address: 750 North Nash Street, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Hyatt Place Los Angeles / LAX / El Segundo located 2 mi from Los Angeles International Airport, features an outdoor pool and free WiFi. Guests can make use of the fitness center, 24-hour restaurant and bar. Complimentary breakfast is offered. A 55-inch high definition flat-screen TV with extended film channels is provided in each air-conditioned guest room at Hyatt Place Los Angeles/LAX/El Segundo. Each room includes a sofa bed, a refrigerator and a coffee machine. Each private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Hyatt Place Los Angeles / LAX / El Segundo is centrally located in Los Angeles and South Bay corporate offices are minutes away. Top destinations in the city are nearby. Hyatt Place Hotel shuttle from Los Angeles International Airport is available 5:00AM to 10:45PM. Pick-up located on the upper level (Departures). Wait by the RED Hotel Shuttle sign. Please note that the shuttle cannot wait at the designated pick-up, please contact shuttle once you are ready and by the designated pick-up sign. For pick-up requests text/call +1 (949) 201-7665 and provide your name, phone number, number of passengers, and terminal. Shuttle will only accept passengers who text/call once they’re ready for pick-up. Shuttle time is 6am-10:45pm

name: Sheraton Universal Hotel
address: 333 Universal Hollywood Drive, Universal City, CA 91608
description: Find the AAA 4-diamond Sheraton Universal Hotel nestled beneath the Hollywood Hills, minutes from Universal Studios Hollywood and Universal City. Walk to the Red Line metro for easy access to attractions throughout Los Angeles, CA, including the Walk of Fame and TCL Chinese Theatre. Our hotel rooms pay homage to our Hollywood history with a sleek, minimalist ambiance. Recharge with Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience® beds, smart TVs and floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning views of Universal Studios, the San Fernando Valley or the Hollywood Hills. Start your day with breakfast at The California, then ride our free shuttle to Universal Studios Hollywood. After a day in the park, unwind beside our hotel pool or visit In the Mix, our on-site bar serving an extensive selection of drinks. Take in 270-degree views of Hollywood, CA, from the 20-foot windows in the rooftop Starview Room. Whether you're visiting California for a business trip or family vacation, Sheraton Universal Hotel welcomes you.Marriott

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport
address: 7501 North Glenoaks Boulevard, Burbank, CA 91504
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport is located in the center of everything: the Bob Hope Airport, shopping, dining, and entertainment are all within minutes of the hotel. See one of your favorite game shows or late night talk shows in person. We are proud to have Disney, Universal Studios, NBC, CBS & Fox as our neighbors, in the heart of Burbank. Feel like seeing more? Visit Six Flags Magic Mountain, Disneyland, California Adventure Land or Knott’s Berry Farm Amusement parks for a thrill you and your family will be sure not to forget. Surf on over to the Santa Monica beach and Pier or cruise on over to the Venice Boardwalk for authentic street entertainment. If your into snowboarding or skiing Big Bear lake, Mountain High & Snow Summit are only hours away! Whether you're surfing the web or checking your e-mail, take advantage of our complimentary high-speed Internet access in our guest rooms and lobby area to save you time and money. Our guest rooms come equipped with a large work desk equipped and an ergonomic chair and a data port for wired connectivity. Feel like relaxing on the bed and working? Our Cloud Nine bed does away with the old-fashioned bedspread, featuring instead a, white duvet cover, enveloping a lofty white comforter. The bed features four pillows providing consumers a choice in firmness (some filled with soft down, some with firmer foam), a lumbar pillow in a soothing color that provides guests back support if they choose to read, watch television or enjoy the Hampton lap desk and work wirelessly while resting in bed. Relax and unwind with an in-room movie or take advantage of our heated pool and spa. Working through the night and need a late night energy boost? Purchase a light snack or drink from our convenient suite shop located in lobby. And don't forget about the complimentary On the House hot breakfast in the morning. Our new utensils, made from 100% renewable resources, will help you reduce your carbon footprint, one step at a time, and feed your hunger all in a days work. In a hurry? Grab one of our On The Run Breakfast Bags with over 20 different items to start each day off right. Before you start your day, don't forget to grab a complimentary cup of coffee/tea or pick-up a copy of the latest USA Today in the lobby each morning. We also provide complimentary parking and shuttle service to the Burbank Airport. Every stay with the Hampton Inn & Suites Burbank Airport offers you additional points and miles for your travel, so sign up for your Hilton HHonors loyalty program today! Our unconditional 100% Hampton Guarantee ensures our travelers complete satisfaction. Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you are not completely satisfied, we don't expect you to pay. That's our commitment and your guarantee. That's 100% HamptonHilton

name: Holiday Inn Los Angeles Gateway - Torrance
address: 19800 South Vermont Avenue, Torrance, CA 90502
description: A Great Hotel for Business or Pleasure in Sunny Los Angeles, CA. The Holiday Inn® Los Angeles Gateway Torrance features deluxe guest rooms and suites including complimentary Wi-Fi, refrigerators, and Keurig coffee makers. Our banquet facilities offer a perfect setting for any business or social event, complete with on-site catering. Located in the Harbor Gateway business district with easy access to I-110, I-405 and 91 freeways you're 15 minutes away from Los Angeles International Airport, Downtown Los Angeles, and LA Live/Convention Center. The Port of LA and Long Beach are also nearby. Business travelers take advantage of being a mile from Honda, and Herbalife. Endless SoCal fun begins as close as South Bay beaches and nearby golf. Create family memories with short drives to Disneyland® Park, Knott's Berry Farm, Universal Studios, & the world-famous Santa Monica Pier. In the mood for shopping, visit Del Amo Fashion Center or take a day trip to Rodeo Drive. Sports enthusiast enjoys being 2.5 mi. from Dignity Health Sports Park. Catch Lakers, Clippers, Kings game at Staples Center or Dodgers, USC football game at their Stadiums. During downtime, visit our Ginger Lounge, take a refreshing dip in our outdoor pool, or enjoy the peaceful sounds of the lobby's koi pond. Start over by checking out our well-equipped fitness center to start your day refreshed.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Ritz-Carlton Marina del Rey
address: 4375 Admiralty Way, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Marina del Rey has the distinction of being the closest hotel to the water of any Ritz-Carlton hotel in the US. The hotel is elegantly situated on one of the largest recreational marinas in the world. There are 304 guest rooms and suites which feature luxurious amenities complemented with the legendary service of The Ritz-Carlton. Cast & Plow restaurant offers locally sourced and farm-fresh ingredients paired with craft cocktails and a revered wine list. Unwind at the heated saltwater waterfront pool and whirlpool. Activities include tennis, paddleball, SUP paddleboards, bicycling and skateboarding. Located less than five miles from Los Angeles International Airport and close to Venice Beach, Malibu and Santa Monica, visitors have easy access to the most popular attractions in Southern California including shopping, theatres, theme parks, studio tours, museums and beaches. The hotel is also 20 minutes from the 53-acre Porsche Experience Center which offers eight unique driving modules.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 901 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience space with modern conveniences in the City of Angels at Residence Inn Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Our dual-branded hotel near Oakland places you in the heart of the downtown district, across from the renowned Los Angeles Convention Center and next to the L.A. LIVE Campus. See a game at the nearby Crypto.com Arena (formerly Staples Center), or go to a concert at the Microsoft Theater, home to the Emmys and the American Music Awards. Back at our hotel, discover extended-stay, apartment-style living with valet parking and free Wi-Fi. Start each day with a complimentary hot breakfast and end with bistro-style cuisine at our hotel restaurant, Table 901. Soak up the California sunshine as you unwind by our third-floor rooftop pool. Each one of our 219 pet-friendly hotel suites showcases a full kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a well-lit work desk and stunning views of downtown L.A.Marriott
